zombiecure3.description: Prevents zombies from reviving, but not from healing. Removes moderate infections.
zombiecure3.name: Anti-Plague Sequence Gamma

zombiecure2.description: Cures low-level infections. Weakens zombies when in their system.
zombiecure2.name: Anti-Plague Sequence Beta

zombiecure4.description: Cures all cases of the Necrotizing Plague. Stops zombies from reviving.
zombiecure4.name: Anti-Plague Sequence Omega

zombiecure1.description: The first step towards a cure for zombies. Prevents simple infections from scratches.
zombiecure1.name: Anti-Plague Sequence Alpha

xenomicrobes.description: Microbes with an entirely alien cellular structure.
xenomicrobes.name: Xenomicrobes

water.description: A ubiquitous chemical substance that is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.
water.name: Water

vomit.description: Looks like someone lost their lunch. And then collected it. Yuck.
vomit.name: Vomit

venom.description: An incredibly potent poison. Origin unknown.
venom.name: Venom

uranium.description: A silvery-white metallic chemical element in the actinide series, weakly radioactive.
uranium.name: Uranium

teapowder.description: Finely shredded Tea leaves, used for making tea.
teapowder.name: Ground Tea Leaves

coffeepowder.description: Finely ground Coffee beans, used to make coffee.
coffeepowder.name: Coffee Grounds

toxic_slurry.description: A filthy, carcinogenic sludge produced by the Slurrypod plant.
toxic_slurry.name: Toxic Slurry

thermite.description: Thermite produces an aluminothermic reaction known as a thermite reaction. Can be used to melt walls.
thermite.name: Thermite

thc.description: A mild psychoactive chemical extracted from the cannabis plant.
thc.name: Tetrahydrocannabinol
thc.taste_description: man like, totally the best like, thing ever dude

teslium.description: An unstable, electrically-charged metallic slurry. Increases the conductance of living things.
teslium.name: Teslium

terror_black_toxin.description: An incredibly toxic venom injected by the Black Widow spider.
terror_black_toxin.name: Black Terror venom

sticky_tar.description: A sticky compound that creates tar on contact with surfaces.
sticky_tar.name: Sticky tar

surge.description: A sketchy superconducting gel that overloads processors, causing an effect reportedly similar to opiates in synthetic units.
surge.name: Surge

super_hairgrownium.description: A mysterious and powerful chemical purported to cause rapid hair growth.
super_hairgrownium.name: Super Hairgrownium

sulfonal.description: Deals some toxin damage, and puts you to sleep after 66 seconds.
sulfonal.name: Sulfonal

tirizene.description: A toxin that affects the stamina of a person when injected into the bloodstream.
tirizene.name: Tirizene

stable_mutagen.description: Just the regular, boring sort of mutagenic compound. Works in a completely predictable manner.
stable_mutagen.name: Stable mutagen

stabilizing_agent.description: A chemical that stabilises normally volatile compounds, preventing them from reacting immediately.
stabilizing_agent.name: Stabilizing Agent

spraytan.description: A substance applied to the skin to darken the skin.
spraytan.name: Spray Tan

spore.description: A natural toxin produced by blob spores that inhibits vision when ingested.
spore.name: Spore Toxin

spidertoxin.description: A toxic venom injected by spacefaring arachnids.
spidertoxin.name: Spider venom

spidereggs.description: A fine dust containing spider eggs. Oh gosh.
spidereggs.name: Spider eggs

space_drugs.description: An illegal chemical compound used as drug.
space_drugs.name: Space drugs

cleaner.description: A compound used to clean things. Now with 50% more sodium hypochlorite!
cleaner.name: Space cleaner

sorium.description: Sends everything flying from the detonation point.
sorium.name: Sorium

soapreagent.description: Soap, fit to clean the mouth of a sailor.
soapreagent.name: Soap

smoke_powder.description: Makes a large cloud of smoke that can carry reagents.
smoke_powder.name: Smoke Powder

mutationtoxin.description: A corruptive toxin produced by slimes.
mutationtoxin.name: Mutation Toxin

slimejelly.description: A gooey semi-liquid produced from one of the deadliest lifeforms in existence. SO REAL.
slimejelly.name: Slime Jelly

silver.description: A lustrous metallic element regarded as one of the precious metals.
silver.name: Silver

silicon.description: A tetravalent metalloid, silicon is less reactive than its chemical analog carbon.
silicon.name: Silicon

saturated_charcoal.description: Charcoal that is completely saturated with various toxins. Useless.
saturated_charcoal.name: Saturated activated charcoal

salmonella.description: A nasty bacteria found in spoiled food.
salmonella.name: Salmonella

royal_bee_jelly.description: Royal Bee Jelly, if injected into a Queen Space Bee said bee will split into two bees.
royal_bee_jelly.name: Royal bee jelly

rotatium.description: A constantly swirling, oddly colourful fluid. Causes the consumer's sense of direction and hand-eye coordination to become wild.
rotatium.name: Rotatium

radium.description: Radium is an alkaline earth metal. It is extremely radioactive.
radium.name: Radium

pyrosium.description: Comes into existence at 20K. As long as there is sufficient oxygen for it to react with, Pyrosium slowly heats all other reagents.
pyrosium.name: Pyrosium

pump_up.description: An awful smelling mixture which acts as a makeshift stimulant
pump_up.name: Pump Up

psilocybin.description: A strong psycotropic derived from certain species of mushroom.
psilocybin.name: Psilocybin

prions.description: A disease-causing agent that is neither bacterial nor fungal nor viral and contains no genetic material.
prions.name: Prions

potassium.description: A soft, low-melting solid that can easily be cut with a knife. Reacts violently with water.
potassium.name: Potassium

polonium.description: Cause significant Radiation damage over time.
polonium.name: Polonium

plasma_dust.description: A fine dust of plasma. This chemical has unusual mutagenic properties for viruses and slimes alike.
plasma_dust.name: Plasma Dust

plasma.description: The liquid phase of an unusual extraterrestrial compound.
plasma.name: Plasma

robustharvestnutrient.description: Very potent nutrient that increases yield.
robustharvestnutrient.name: Robust Harvest

mutrient.description: Plant nutrient designed to trigger mild genetic drift.
mutrient.name: Mutrient

left4zednutrient.description: Unstable nutrient that makes plants mutate strongly at the cost of minimal yield.
left4zednutrient.name: Left 4 Zed

eznutrient.description: Cheap and boring nutrition for plants.
eznutrient.name: E-Z-Nutrient

plantnutrient.description: Some kind of nutrient. You can't really tell what it is. You should probably report it, along with how you obtained it.
plantnutrient.name: Generic nutrient

phlogiston_dust.description: And this is solid fire. However that works.
phlogiston_dust.name: Phlogiston dust

phlogiston.description: It appears to be liquid fire.
phlogiston.name: Phlogiston

phenol.description: Also known as carbolic acid, this is a useful building block in organic chemistry.
phenol.name: Phenol

pestkiller.description: A harmful toxic mixture to kill pests. Do not ingest!
pestkiller.name: Pest Killer

pax.description: A colorless liquid that suppresses violence in its subjects.
pax.name: Pax

pancuronium.description: Pancuronium bromide is a powerful skeletal muscle relaxant.
pancuronium.name: Pancuronium

paint_remover.description: Paint remover is used to remove floor paint from floor tiles.
paint_remover.name: Paint Remover

paint_.description: Floor paint is used to color floor tiles.
paint_.name: Paint

cooking_oil_inert.description: It's full of char and mixed with so much crud it's probably useless.
cooking_oil_inert.name: Burned Cooking Oil

cooking_oil.description: You should probably pour this down the sink, where it belongs.
cooking_oil.name: Cooking Oil

oil.description: A decent lubricant for machines. High in benzene, naptha and other hydrocarbons.
oil.name: Oil

nicotine.description: If overdosed it will deal toxin and oxygen damage.
nicotine.name: Nicotine

neurotoxin2.description: A dangerous toxin that attacks the nervous system.
neurotoxin2.name: Neurotoxin

mutagen.description: Might cause unpredictable mutations. Keep away from children.
mutagen.name: Unstable mutagen

msg.description: Monosodium Glutamate is a sodium salt known chiefly for its use as a controversial flavor enhancer.
msg.name: Monosodium glutamate

minttoxin.description: Useful for dealing with undesirable customers.
minttoxin.name: Mint Toxin

methamphetamine.description: Increases stun times, speeds the user up, and allows the user to quickly recover stamina while dealing a large amount of brain damage and making the user waste away. If overdosed the subject will move randomly, laugh randomly, drop items and suffer from Toxin and Brain damage. If addicted the subject will constantly jitter and drool, before becoming dizzy and losing motor control and eventually suffer heavy toxin damage.
methamphetamine.name: Methamphetamine

mephedrone.description: A drug originally developed by and for plutonians to assist them during raids. Does not see wide use due to the whole reality-disassociation and heart disease thing afterwards. Can be intentionally overdosed to increase the drug's effects.
mephedrone.name: Mephedrone

teporone.description: This experimental plasma-based compound seems to regulate body temperature.
teporone.name: Teporone

syndicate_nanites.description: Miniature medical robots that swiftly restore bodily damage. May begin to attack their host's cells in high amounts.
syndicate_nanites.name: Restorative Nanites

recal.description: An oily insulating liquid that passively regulates electrical activity on sensitive electronic components, allowing them to recover from decalibrating events faster. Overdosing will cause under-voltage errors and hamper component heat dissipation, potentially causing heat damage.
recal.name: Recal

synaptizine.description: Synaptizine is used to treat neuroleptic shock. Can be used to help remove disabling symptoms such as confusion.
synaptizine.name: Synaptizine

surge_plus.description: A high quality, low-viscocity gel that both supercharges processors and massively increases the efficincy of synthetic locomotive systems, allowing the user to run faster whilst also clearing stuns. If overdosed, it will cause short-circuits that will inflict damage and reduce locomotive efficiancy gains.
surge_plus.name: Surge Plus

stimulative_agent.description: Increases run speed and eliminates stuns, can heal minor damage. If overdosed it will deal toxin damage and be less effective for healing stamina.
stimulative_agent.name: Stimulative Agent

stimulants.description: An illegal compound that dramatically enhances the body's performance and healing capabilities.
stimulants.name: Stimulants

sterilizine.description: Sterilizes wounds in preparation for surgery.
sterilizine.name: Sterilizine

spaceacillin.description: An all-purpose antibiotic agent extracted from space fungus.
spaceacillin.name: Spaceacillin

sanguine_reagent.description: A deeply crimson almost-gel that can mimic blood, regardless of type.
sanguine_reagent.name: Sanguine Reagent

salglu_solution.description: This saline and glucose solution can help stabilize critically injured patients and cleanse wounds.
salglu_solution.name: Saline-Glucose Solution

salbutamol.description: Salbutamol is a common bronchodilation medication for asthmatics. It may help with other breathing problems as well.
salbutamol.name: Salbutamol

sal_acid.description: This is a is a standard salicylate pain reliever and fever reducer.
sal_acid.name: Salicylic Acid

rezadone.description: A powder derived from fish toxin, Rezadone can effectively treat genetic damage as well as restoring minor wounds. Overdose will cause intense nausea and minor toxin damage.
rezadone.name: Rezadone

potass_iodide.description: Potassium Iodide is a medicinal drug used to counter the effects of radiation poisoning.
potass_iodide.name: Potassium Iodide

perfluorodecalin.description: This experimental perfluoronated solvent has applications in liquid breathing and tissue oxygenation. Use with caution.
perfluorodecalin.name: Perfluorodecalin

pen_acid.description: Pentetic Acid is an aggressive chelation agent. May cause tissue damage. Use with caution.
pen_acid.name: Pentetic Acid

osseous_reagent.description: A solution of pinkish gel with white shards floating in it, which is supposedly able to be processed into bone gel.
osseous_reagent.name: Osseous Reagent

godblood.description: Slowly heals all damage types. Has a rather high overdose threshold. Glows with mysterious power.
godblood.name: Godblood

weak_omnizine.description: Slowly heals all damage types. A far weaker substitute than actual omnizine.
weak_omnizine.name: Diluted Omnizine

synthetic_omnizine_no_addiction.description: An exotic liquid metal alloy that flows into cracks, fractures, and other surface imperfections before solidifying to patch up damaged components.
synthetic_omnizine_no_addiction.name: Smart Metal

omnizine.description: Omnizine is a highly potent healing medication that can be used to treat a wide range of injuries.
omnizine.name: Omnizine

oculine.description: Oculine is a saline eye medication with mydriatic and antibiotic effects.
oculine.name: Oculine

nanocalcium.description: Highly advanced nanites equipped with an unknown payload designed to repair a body. Nanomachines son.
nanocalcium.name: Nano-Calcium

mutadone.description: Mutadone is an experimental bromide that can cure genetic abnomalities.
mutadone.name: Mutadone

morphine.description: A strong but highly addictive opiate painkiller with sedative side effects.
morphine.name: Morphine

mitocholide.description: A specialized drug that stimulates the mitochondria of cells to encourage healing of internal organs.
mitocholide.name: Mitocholide

menthol.description: Menthol relieves burns and aches while providing a cooling sensation.
menthol.name: Menthol

mannitol.description: Mannitol is a sugar alcohol that can help alleviate cranial swelling.
mannitol.name: Mannitol

liquid_solder.description: A solution formulated to clean and repair damaged connections in posibrains while in use.
liquid_solder.name: Liquid Solder

lazarus_reagent.description: A bioluminescent green fluid that seems to move on its own.
lazarus_reagent.name: Lazarus Reagent

lavaland_extract.description: An extract of lavaland atmospheric and mineral elements. Heals the user in small doses, but is extremely toxic otherwise.
lavaland_extract.name: Lavaland Extract

kelotane.description: Restores fire damage. Overdose causes it instead.
kelotane.name: Kelotane

insulin.description: A hormone generated by the pancreas responsible for metabolizing carbohydrates and fat in the bloodstream.
insulin.name: Insulin

hydrocodone.description: An extremely effective painkiller; may have long term abuse consequences.
hydrocodone.name: Hydrocodone

synthflesh.description: A resorbable microfibrillar collagen and protein mixture that can rapidly heal injuries when applied topically.
synthflesh.name: Synthflesh

styptic_powder.description: Styptic (aluminum sulfate) powder helps control bleeding and heal physical wounds.
styptic_powder.name: Styptic Powder

silver_sulfadiazine.description: This antibacterial compound is used to treat burn victims.
silver_sulfadiazine.name: Silver Sulfadiazine

haloperidol.description: Haloperidol is a powerful antipsychotic and sedative. Will help control psychiatric problems, but may cause brain damage.
haloperidol.name: Haloperidol

epinephrine.description: Epinephrine is a potent neurotransmitter, used in medical emergencies to halt anaphylactic shock and prevent cardiac arrest.
epinephrine.name: Epinephrine

earthsblood.description: Ichor from an extremely powerful plant. Great for restoring wounds, but it's a little heavy on the brain.
earthsblood.name: Earthsblood

diphenhydramine.description: Anti-allergy medication. May cause drowsiness, do not operate heavy machinery while using this.
diphenhydramine.name: Diphenhydramine

degreaser.description: An industrial degreaser which can be used to clean residual build-up from machinery and surfaces.
degreaser.name: Degreaser

cryoxadone.description: A plasma mixture with almost magical healing powers. Its main limitation is that the targets body temperature must be under 265K for it to metabolise correctly.
cryoxadone.name: Cryoxadone

corazone.description: A medication used to treat pain, fever, and inflammation, along with heart attacks.
corazone.name: Corazone

charcoal.description: Activated charcoal helps to absorb toxins.
charcoal.name: Charcoal

calomel.description: This potent purgative rids the body of impurities. It is highly toxic however and close supervision is required.
calomel.name: Calomel

bicaridine.description: Restores bruising. Overdose causes it instead.
bicaridine.name: Bicaridine

atropine.description: Atropine is a potent cardiac resuscitant but it can causes confusion, dizzyness and hyperthermia.
atropine.name: Atropine

antihol.description: A medicine which quickly eliminates alcohol in the body.
antihol.name: Antihol

nanites.description: Nanomachines that aid in rapid cellular regeneration.
nanites.name: Nanites

adminordrazine.description: It's magic. We don't have to explain it.
adminordrazine.name: Adminordrazine

ultralube.description: Ultra-Lube is an enhanced lubricant which induces effect similar to Methamphetamine in synthetic users by drastically reducing internal friction and increasing cooling capabilities.
ultralube.name: Ultra-Lube

lube.description: Lubricant is a substance introduced between two moving surfaces to reduce the friction and wear between them. giggity.
lube.name: Space Lube

lsd.description: A highly potent hallucinogenic substance. Far out, maaaan.
lsd.name: Lysergic acid diethylamide

love.description: What is this emotion you humans call \"love?\"  Oh, it's this?  This is it? Huh, well okay then, thanks.
love.name: Pure love

liquidgibs.description: You don't even want to think about what's in here.
liquidgibs.name: Liquid gibs

liquid_dark_matter.description: Sucks everything into the detonation point.
liquid_dark_matter.name: Liquid Dark Matter

lipolicide.description: A compound found in many seedy dollar stores in the form of a weight-loss tonic.
lipolicide.name: Lipolicide

lexorin.description: Lexorin temporarily stops respiration. Causes tissue damage.
lexorin.name: Lexorin

krokodil.description: A sketchy homemade opiate, often used by disgruntled Cosmonauts.
krokodil.name: Krokodil

jestosterone.description: Jestosterone is an odd chemical compound that induces a variety of annoying side-effects in the average person. It also causes mild intoxication, and is toxic to mimes.
jestosterone.name: Jestosterone

jenkem.description: Jenkem is a prison drug made from fermenting feces in a solution of urine. Extremely disgusting.
jenkem.name: Jenkem
jenkem.taste_description: the inside of a toilet... or worse

jagged_crystals.description: Rapid chemical decomposition has warped these crystals into twisted spikes.
jagged_crystals.name: Jagged Crystals

itching_powder.description: An abrasive powder beloved by cruel pranksters.
itching_powder.name: Itching Powder

initropidril.description: A highly potent cardiac poison - can kill within minutes.
initropidril.name: Initropidril

hydrogen.description: A colorless, odorless, nonmetallic, tasteless, highly combustible diatomic gas.
hydrogen.name: Hydrogen

hugs.description: Hugs, in liquid form.  Yes, the concept of a hug.  As a liquid.  This makes sense in the future.
hugs.name: Pure hugs

holywater.description: A ubiquitous chemical substance that is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.
holywater.name: Water

histamine.description: Immune-system neurotransmitter. If detected in blood, the subject is likely undergoing an allergic reaction.
histamine.name: Histamine

heparin.description: An anticoagulant used in heart surgeries, and in the treatment of heart attacks and blood clots.
heparin.name: Heparin

heartworms.description: Aww, gross! These things can't be good for your heart. They're gunna eat it!
heartworms.name: Space heartworms

happiness.description: Fills you with ecstasic numbness and causes minor brain damage. If overdosed, causes sudden mood swings and spikes in heart rate.
happiness.name: Happiness

hairgrownium.description: A mysterious chemical purported to help grow hair. Often found on late-night TV infomercials.
hairgrownium.name: Hairgrownium

hair_dye.description: A rather tubular and gnarly way of coloring totally bodacious hair. Duuuudddeee.
hair_dye.name: Quantum Hair Dye
hair_dye.taste_description: the 2559 Autumn release of the Le Jeune Homme catalogue for professional hairdressers

growthserum.description: A commercial chemical designed to help older men in the bedroom.
growthserum.name: Growth serum

green_vomit.description: Whoa, that can't be natural. That's horrible.
green_vomit.name: Green vomit

gold.description: Gold is a dense, soft, shiny metal and the most malleable and ductile metal known.
gold.name: Gold

atrazine.description: A herbicidal compound used for destroying unwanted plants.
atrazine.name: Atrazine

glyphosate.description: A broad-spectrum herbicide that is highly effective at killing all plants.
glyphosate.name: Glyphosate

glycerol.description: Glycerol is a simple polyol compound. Glycerol is sweet-tasting and of low toxicity.
glycerol.name: Glycerol

gluttonytoxin.description: An advanced corruptive toxin produced by something terrible.
gluttonytoxin.name: Gluttony's Blessing

glowing_slurry.description: This is probably not good for you.
glowing_slurry.name: Glowing Slurry

ginsonic.description: GOTTA GET CRUNK FAST BUT LIQUOR TOO SLOW
ginsonic.drink_desc: An extremely high amperage drink. Absolutely not for the true Englishman.
ginsonic.name: Gin and sonic

fungus.description: Scrapings of some unknown fungus found growing on the station walls.
fungus.name: Space fungus

unholywater.description: Something that shouldn't exist on this plane of existence.
unholywater.name: Unholy Water

fuel.description: A highly flammable blend of basic hydrocarbons, mostly Acetylene. Useful for both welding and organic chemistry, and can be fortified into a heavier oil.
fuel.drink_desc: Unless you are an industrial tool, this is probably not safe for consumption.
fuel.name: Welding fuel

formaldehyde.description: Formaldehyde is a common industrial chemical and is used to preserve corpses and medical samples. It is highly toxic and irritating.
formaldehyde.name: Formaldehyde

fluorosurfactant.description: A perfluoronated sulfonic acid that forms a foam when mixed with water.
fluorosurfactant.name: Fluorosurfactant

toiletwater.description: Filthy water scoured from a nasty toilet bowl. Absolutely disgusting.
toiletwater.name: Toilet Water
toiletwater.taste_description: the inside of a toilet... or worse

fishwater.description: Smelly water from a fish tank. Gross!
fishwater.name: Fish Water

firefighting_foam.description: Carbon Tetrachloride is a foam used for fire suppression.
firefighting_foam.name: Firefighting foam
firefighting_foam.taste_description: the inside of a fire extinguisher

ectoplasm.description: A bizarre gelatinous substance supposedly derived from ghosts.
ectoplasm.name: Ectoplasm

drying_agent.description: Can be used to dry things.
drying_agent.name: Drying agent

diethylamine.description: A secondary amine, useful as a plant nutrient and as building block for other compounds.
diethylamine.name: Diethylamine

cyanide.description: A highly toxic chemical with some uses as a building block for other things.
cyanide.name: Cyanide

cryostylane.description: Comes into existence at 20K. As long as there is sufficient oxygen for it to react with, Cryostylane slowly cools all other reagents in the mob down to 0K.
cryostylane.name: Cryostylane

crank.description: Reduces stun times and improves stamina regeneration. If overdosed or addicted it will deal significant Toxin, Brute and Brain damage.
crank.name: Crank

olivepaste.description: A mushy pile of freshly ground olives.
olivepaste.name: Olive Paste

weird_cheese.description: Hell, I don't even know if this IS cheese. Whatever it is, it ain't normal. If you want to, pour it out to make it solid.
weird_cheese.name: Weird cheese

wasabi.description: A pungent green paste often served with sushi. Consuming too much causes an uncomfortable burning sensation in the nostrils.
wasabi.name: Wasabi

vitfro.description: A bubbly paste that heals wounds of the skin.
vitfro.name: Vitrium Froth

virusfood.description: A mixture of water, milk, and oxygen. Virus cells can use this mixture to reproduce.
virusfood.name: Virus Food

vinegar.description: Useful for pickling, or putting on chips.
vinegar.name: Vinegar

vhfcs.description: An incredibly sweet syrup, created from corn syrup treated with enzymes to convert its sugars into fructose.
vhfcs.name: Very-high-fructose corn syrup

vanilla.description: A fatty, bitter paste made from vanilla pods.
vanilla.name: Vanilla

tinlux.description: A stimulating ichor which causes luminescent fungi to grow on the skin.
tinlux.name: Tinea Luxor

sugar.description: The organic compound commonly known as table sugar and sometimes called saccharose. This white, odorless, crystalline powder has a pleasing, sweet taste.
sugar.name: Sugar

sprinkles.description: Multi-colored little bits of sugar, commonly found on donuts. Loved by cops.
sprinkles.name: Sprinkles

soysauce.description: A salty sauce made from the soy plant.
soysauce.name: Soysauce

soybeanoil.description: An oil derived from extra-terrestrial soybeans.
soybeanoil.name: Space-soybean oil

rice.description: Enjoy the great taste of nothing.
rice.name: Rice

porktonium.description: A highly-radioactive pork byproduct first discovered in hotdogs.
porktonium.name: Porktonium

peanutbutter.description: A rich, creamy spread made by grinding peanuts.
peanutbutter.name: Peanut Butter

onionjuice.description: A strong tasting substance that can induce partial blindness.
onionjuice.name: Concentrated Onion Juice

oliveoil.description: A high quality oil derived from olives. Suitable for dishes or mixtures requiring oil.
oliveoil.name: Olive Oil

vitamin.description: All the best vitamins, minerals, and carbohydrates the body needs in pure form.
vitamin.name: Vitamin

protein.description: Various essential proteins and fats commonly found in animal flesh and blood.
protein.name: Protein

plantmatter.description: Vitamin-rich fibers and natural sugars commonly found in fresh produce.
plantmatter.name: Plant-matter

nutriment.description: A questionable mixture of various pure nutrients commonly found in processed foods.
nutriment.name: Nutriment

mugwort.description: A rather bitter herb once thought to hold magical protective properties.
mugwort.name: Mugwort

mint.description: A light green liquid extracted from mint leaves.
mint.name: Mint

meatslurry.description: A paste comprised of highly-processed organic material. Uncomfortably similar to deviled ham spread.
meatslurry.name: Meat Slurry

mayonnaise.description: A white and oily mixture of mixed egg yolks.
mayonnaise.name: Mayonnaise

mashedpotatoes.description: A starchy food paste made from boiled potatoes.
mashedpotatoes.name: Mashed potatoes

ketchup.description: Ketchup, catsup, whatever. It's tomato paste.
ketchup.name: Ketchup

hydrogenated_soybeanoil.description: An oil derived from extra-terrestrial soybeans, with additional hydrogen atoms added to convert it into a saturated form.
hydrogenated_soybeanoil.name: Partially hydrogenated space-soybean oil

hot_ramen.description: The noodles are boiled, the flavors are artificial, just like being back in school.
hot_ramen.name: Hot Ramen

honey.description: A sweet substance produced by bees through partial digestion. Bee barf.
honey.name: Honey

hell_ramen.description: The noodles are boiled, the flavors are artificial, just like being back in school...IN HELL
hell_ramen.name: Hell Ramen

gravy.description: A savory sauce made from a simple meat-dripping roux and milk.
gravy.name: Gravy

garlic.description: Crushed garlic. Chefs love it, but it can make you smell bad.
garlic.name: Garlic Juice

frostoil.description: A special oil that noticably chills the body. Extraced from Icepeppers.
frostoil.name: Frost Oil

flour.description: This is what you rub all over yourself to pretend to be a ghost.
flour.name: Flour

fake_cheese.description: A cheese-like substance derived loosely from actual cheese.
fake_cheese.name: Cheese substitute

wine.description: An premium alchoholic beverage made from distilled grape juice.
wine.name: Wine

whiterussian.description: That's just, like, your opinion, man...
whiterussian.drink_desc: A very nice looking drink. But that's just, like, your opinion, man.
whiterussian.name: White Russian

whiskeysour.description: A tantalizing mixture of whiskey, sugar, lemon juice... and egg whites?
whiskeysour.drink_desc: Lemon and whiskey, with a cute foamy head!
whiskeysour.name: Whiskey Sour

whiskeycola.description: Whiskey, mixed with cola. Surprisingly refreshing.
whiskeycola.drink_desc: An innocent-looking mixture of cola and Whiskey. Delicious.
whiskeycola.name: Whiskey Cola

whiskey.description: A superb and well-aged single-malt whiskey. Damn.
whiskey.drink_desc: The silky, smokey whiskey goodness inside the glass makes the drink look very classy.
whiskey.name: Whiskey

vodkatonic.description: For when a gin and tonic isn't russian enough.
vodkatonic.drink_desc: For when a gin and tonic isn't russian enough.
vodkatonic.name: Vodka and Tonic

vodkamartini.description: Vodka with Gin. Not quite how 007 enjoyed it, but still delicious.
vodkamartini.drink_desc: A bastardisation of the classic martini. Still great.
vodkamartini.name: Vodka Martini

vodka.description: Number one drink AND fueling choice for Russians worldwide.
vodka.name: Vodka

vermouth.description: You suddenly feel a craving for a martini...
vermouth.drink_desc: You wonder why you're even drinking this straight.
vermouth.name: Vermouth

ultramatter.description: In the triangle of fire, this is apex of fuel.
ultramatter.drink_desc: In the triangle of fire, this is apex of fuel.
ultramatter.name: Ultramatter

toxinsspecial.description: This thing is FLAMING!. CALL THE DAMN SHUTTLE!
toxinsspecial.drink_desc: Whoah, this thing is on FIRE
toxinsspecial.name: Toxins Special

threemileisland.description: Made for a woman, strong enough for a man.
threemileisland.drink_desc: A glass of this is sure to prevent a meltdown.
threemileisland.name: Three Mile Island Iced Tea

thirteenloko.description: A potent mixture of caffeine and alcohol.
thirteenloko.drink_desc: This is a glass of Thirteen Loko, it appears to be of the highest quality. The drink, not the glass
thirteenloko.name: Thirteen Loko

tequilasunrise.description: Tequila and orange juice. Much like a Screwdriver, only Mexican~
tequilasunrise.drink_desc: Oh great, now you feel nostalgic about sunrises back on Terra...
tequilasunrise.name: Tequila Sunrise

tequila.description: A strong and mildly flavoured, mexican produced spirit. Feeling thirsty hombre?
tequila.drink_desc: Now all that's missing is the weird colored shades!
tequila.name: Tequila

uplink.description: A potent mix of alcohol and synthanol. Will only work on synthetics.
uplink.drink_desc: An exquisite mix of the finest liquoirs and synthanol. Meant only for synthetics.
uplink.name: Uplink

trinary.description: A fruit drink meant only for synthetics, however that works.
trinary.drink_desc: Colorful drink made for synthetic crewmembers. It doesn't seem like it would taste well.
trinary.name: Trinary

synthnsoda.description: The classic drink adjusted for a robot's tastes.
synthnsoda.drink_desc: Classic drink altered to fit the tastes of a robot. Bad idea to drink if you're made of carbon.
synthnsoda.name: Synth 'n Soda

synthignon.description: Someone mixed wine and alcohol for robots. Hope you're proud of yourself.
synthignon.drink_desc: Someone mixed good wine and robot booze. Romantic, but atrocious.
synthignon.name: Synthignon

servo.description: A drink containing some organic ingredients, but meant only for synthetics.
servo.drink_desc: Chocolate - based drink made for IPCs. Not sure if anyone's actually tried out the recipe.
servo.name: Servo

robottears.description: An oily substance that an IPC could technically consider a 'drink'.
robottears.drink_desc: No robots were hurt in the making of this drink.
robottears.name: Robot Tears

synthanol.description: A runny liquid with conductive capacities. Its effects on synthetics are similar to those of alcohol on organics.
synthanol.drink_desc: The equivalent of alcohol for synthetic crewmembers. They'd find it awful if they had tastebuds too.
synthanol.name: Synthanol

suicider.description: An unbelievably strong and potent variety of Cider.
suicider.drink_desc: You've really hit rock bottom now... your liver packed its bags and left last night.
suicider.name: Suicider

stout.description: A pitch black beer, high in iron content
stout.drink_desc: A pitch black beer from Ireland, high in iron content
stout.name: Stout

specialwhiskey.description: Just when you thought regular station whiskey was good... This silky, amber goodness has to come along and ruin everything.
specialwhiskey.name: Special Blend Whiskey

sontse.description: You see sun bobbing inside of this drink. How this is even possible?
sontse.drink_desc: The Sun, The Sun, The Sun, The Sun, The Sun, THE SUN!
sontse.name: Sontse

slimemold.description: You can swear that this jelly looks alive.
slimemold.drink_desc: You can swear that this jelly looks alive.
slimemold.name: Slime Mold

sidecar.description: A citrus cocktail of cognac, lemon and orange.
sidecar.drink_desc: You can smell the citrus from here!
sidecar.name: Sidecar

screwdrivercocktail.description: Vodka, mixed with plain ol' orange juice. The result is surprisingly delicious.
screwdrivercocktail.drink_desc: A simple, yet superb mixture of Vodka and orange juice. Just the thing for the tired engineer.
screwdrivercocktail.name: Screwdriver

sbiten.description: A spicy Vodka! Might be a little hot for the little guys!
sbiten.drink_desc: A spicy mix of Vodka and Spice. Very hot.
sbiten.name: Sbiten

rum.description: Popular with the sailors. Not very popular with everyone else.
rum.drink_desc: Now you want to Pray for a pirate suit, don't you?
rum.name: Rum

red_mead.description: The true Viking drink! Even though it has a strange red color.
red_mead.drink_desc: A True Vikings Beverage, though its color is strange.
red_mead.name: Red Mead

pinacolada.drink_desc: After taking a sip, you feel contractually obligated to start singing a certain song of the same name.
pinacolada.name: Pina Colada

patron.description: Tequila with silver in it, a favorite of alcoholic women in the club scene.
patron.drink_desc: Drinking patron in the bar, with all the subpar ladies.
patron.name: Patron

neurotoxin.description: A strong neurotoxin that puts the subject into a death-like state.
neurotoxin.drink_desc: A drink that is guaranteed to knock you silly.
neurotoxin.name: Neuro-toxin

moonshine.description: You've really hit rock bottom now... your liver packed its bags and left last night.
moonshine.drink_desc: You've really hit rock bottom now... your liver packed its bags and left last night.
moonshine.name: Moonshine

mojito.description: If it's good enough for Spesscuba, it's good enough for you.
mojito.name: Mojito

mintjulep.description: A refreshing, cold mix of whiskey and mint. Perfect for summer!
mintjulep.drink_desc: A dainty glass of whiskey and mint on the rocks. Perfect for summer!
mintjulep.name: Mint Julep

mead.description: A Vikings drink, though a cheap one.
mead.drink_desc: A Vikings Beverage, though a cheap one.
mead.name: Mead

martini.description: Vermouth with Gin. Not quite how 007 enjoyed it, but still delicious.
martini.drink_desc: Damn, the bartender even stirred it, not shook it.
martini.name: Classic Martini

margarita.description: On the rocks with salt on the rim. Arriba~!
margarita.drink_desc: On the rocks with salt on the rim. Arriba~!
margarita.name: Margarita

manlydorf.description: Beer and Ale, brought together in a delicious mix. Intended for true men only.
manlydorf.drink_desc: A manly concotion made from Ale and Beer. Intended for true men only.
manlydorf.name: The Manly Dorf

manhattan_proj.description: A scientist's drink of choice, for pondering ways to blow up the station.
manhattan_proj.drink_desc: A scientist's drink of choice, for thinking how to blow up the station.
manhattan_proj.name: Manhattan Project

manhattan.description: The Detective's undercover drink of choice. He never could stomach gin...
manhattan.drink_desc: The Detective's undercover drink of choice. He never could stomach gin...
manhattan.name: Manhattan

longislandicedtea.description: The liquor cabinet, brought together in a delicious mix. Intended for middle-aged alcoholic women only.
longislandicedtea.drink_desc: The liquor cabinet, brought together in a delicious mix. Intended for middle-aged alcoholic women only.
longislandicedtea.name: Long Island Iced Tea

lager.description: A pale beer commonly drank by football hooligans
lager.drink_desc: A pale beer that's the cause of many a soccer-related fight
lager.name: Lager

kahlua.description: A widely known, Mexican coffee-flavoured liqueur. In production since 1936!
kahlua.name: Kahlua

junglevox.description: Classy drink in a glass vox head with a bit of liquid nitrogen added on.
junglevox.drink_desc: Classy drink in a glass vox head with a bit of liquid nitrogen added on.
junglevox.name: Jungle Vox

jackrose.description: A classic cocktail that had fallen out of fashion, but never out of taste,
jackrose.drink_desc: Drinking this makes you feel like you belong in a luxury hotel bar during the 1920s.
jackrose.name: Jack Rose

islaywhiskey.description: Named in honor of one of the most gritty and earth smelling types of Whiskey of Earth, this drink is a treat for any Diona.
islaywhiskey.drink_desc: Named in honor of one of the most gritty and earth smelling types of Whiskey of Earth, this drink is a treat for any Diona.
islaywhiskey.name: Islay Whiskey

irishcoffee.description: Coffee, and alcohol. More fun than a Mimosa to drink in the morning.
irishcoffee.drink_desc: Coffee and alcohol. More fun than a Mimosa to drink in the morning.
irishcoffee.name: Irish Coffee

irishcream.description: Whiskey-imbued cream, what else would you expect from the Irish.
irishcream.drink_desc: It's cream, mixed with whiskey. What else would you expect from the Irish?
irishcream.name: Irish Cream

iced_beer.description: A beer which is so cold the air around it freezes.
iced_beer.drink_desc: A beer so frosty, the air around it freezes.
iced_beer.name: Iced Beer

howler.description: Old classic human drink that was adopted by Vulpkanin.
howler.drink_desc: Old classic human drink that was adopted by Vulpkanin.
howler.name: Howler

hooch.description: Either someone's failure at cocktail making or attempt in alcohol production. In any case, do you really want to drink that?
hooch.drink_desc: You've really hit rock bottom now... your liver packed its bags and left last night.
hooch.name: Hooch

hippiesdelight.description: You just don't get it maaaan.
hippiesdelight.drink_desc: A drink enjoyed by people during the 1960's.
hippiesdelight.name: Hippie's Delight

grog.drink_desc: A fine and cepa drink for Space.
grog.name: Grog

goldschlager.description: 100 proof cinnamon schnapps, made for alcoholic teen girls on spring break.
goldschlager.drink_desc: 100 proof that teen girls will drink anything with gold in it.
goldschlager.name: Goldschlager

gintonic.description: An all time classic, mild cocktail.
gintonic.drink_desc: A mild but still great cocktail. Drink up, like a true Englishman.
gintonic.name: Gin and Tonic

gin.description: It's gin. In space. I say, good sir.
gin.drink_desc: A crystal clear glass of Griffeater gin.
gin.name: Gin

gimlet.description: A sharp cocktail dating back to the 19th century. Gin and lime, nothing else.
gimlet.drink_desc: There are debates on whether this drink should be half gin and half lime, or three parts gin and one part lime. All you know is, it's alcohol.
gimlet.name: Gimlet

gargleblaster.drink_desc: Does... does this mean that Arthur and Ford are on the station? Oh joy.
gargleblaster.name: Pan-Galactic Gargle Blaster

fruit_wine.description: A wine made from grown plants.
fruit_wine.name: Fruit Wine

flamingmoe.description: This appears to be a mixture of various alcohols blended with prescription medicine. It is lightly toasted...
flamingmoe.drink_desc: Happiness is just a Flaming Moe away!
flamingmoe.name: Flaming Moe
flamingmoe.taste_description: caramelised booze and sweet, salty medicine

fernet_cola.description: A very popular and bittersweet digestif, ideal after a heavy meal. Best served on a sawed-off cola bottle as per tradition.
fernet_cola.drink_desc: A sawed-off cola bottle filled with Fernet Cola. You can hear cuarteto music coming from the inside.
fernet_cola.name: Fernet Cola

fernet.description: An incredibly bitter herbal liqueur used as a digestif.
fernet.drink_desc: Why are you drinking this pure?
fernet.name: Fernet

eggnog.description: For enjoying the most wonderful time of the year.
eggnog.drink_desc: For enjoying the most wonderful time of the year.
eggnog.name: Eggnog

dublindrop.drink_desc: A Dublin drop. Pub legends say one of the ingredients can bring back the dead.
dublindrop.name: Dublin Drop

drunkenblumpkin.description: A weird mix of whiskey and blumpkin juice.
drunkenblumpkin.name: Drunken Blumpkin

driestmartini.description: Only for the experienced. You think you see sand floating in the glass.
driestmartini.drink_desc: Only for the experienced. You think you see sand floating in the glass.
driestmartini.name: Driest Martini

dragonsbreath.description: Possessing this stuff probably breaks the Geneva convention.
dragonsbreath.name: Dragon's Breath
dragonsbreath.taste_description: LIQUID FUCKING DEATH OH GOD WHAT THE FUCK

dionasmash.description: Fake Diona is floating carelessly in the middle of this drink.
dionasmash.drink_desc: Fake Diona is floating carelessly in the middle of this drink.
dionasmash.name: Diona Smash

dieseife.description: There is a piece of soap at the bottom of the glass and it is slowly melting.
dieseife.drink_desc: There is a piece of soap at the bottom of the glass and it is slowly melting.
dieseife.name: Die Seife

demonsblood.drink_desc: Just looking at this thing makes the hair at the back of your neck stand up.
demonsblood.name: Demons Blood

daiquiri.description: Lime juice and sugar mixed with rum. A sweet and refreshing mix.
daiquiri.drink_desc: When Botany gives you limes, make daiquiris.
daiquiri.name: Daiquiri

cubalibre.description: Rum, mixed with cola. Viva la revolution.
cubalibre.drink_desc: A classic mix of rum and cola.
cubalibre.name: Cuba Libre

cognac.description: A sweet and strongly alchoholic drink, made after numerous distillations and years of maturing. Classy as fornication.
cognac.drink_desc: Damn, you feel like some kind of French aristocrat just by holding this.
cognac.name: Cognac

cider.description: An alcoholic beverage derived from apples.
cider.drink_desc: a refreshing glass of traditional cider
cider.name: Cider

bravebull.description: A strange yet pleasurable mixture made of vodka, tomato and lime juice. Or at least you THINK the red stuff is tomato juice.
bravebull.drink_desc: Tequila and Coffee liquor, brought together in a mouthwatering mixture. Drink up.
bravebull.name: Brave Bull

bloodymary.description: A strange yet pleasurable mixture made of vodka, tomato and lime juice. Or at least you THINK the red stuff is tomato juice.
bloodymary.drink_desc: Tomato juice, mixed with Vodka and a lil' bit of lime. Tastes like liquid murder.
bloodymary.name: Bloody Mary

blackrussian.description: For the lactose-intolerant. Still as classy as a White Russian.
blackrussian.drink_desc: For the lactose-intolerant. Still as classy as a White Russian.
blackrussian.name: Black Russian

bilkshake.description: An upsetting treat that combines beer and milk.
bilkshake.drink_desc: Your mind bubbles and oozes as it tries to comprehend what it's seeing. What the HELL is this?
bilkshake.name: Bilkshake

bilk.description: This appears to be beer mixed with milk. Disgusting.
bilk.drink_desc: A brew of milk and beer. For those alcoholics who fear osteoporosis.
bilk.name: Bilk

beer.description: An alcoholic beverage made from malted grains, hops, yeast, and water.
beer.name: Beer

beepskysmash.description: Deny drinking this and prepare for THE LAW.
beepskysmash.drink_desc: Heavy, hot and strong. Just like the Iron fist of the LAW.
beepskysmash.name: Beepsky Smash

beachfeast.description: A classic Unathi drink. You can spot sand sediment at the bottom of the glass. The drink is hot as hell and more.
beachfeast.drink_desc: A classic Unathi drink. You can spot sand sediment at the bottom of the glass. The drink is hot as hell and more.
beachfeast.name: Feast by the Beach

bacchus_blessing.description: Unidentifiable mixture. Unmeasurably high alcohol content.
bacchus_blessing.drink_desc: You didn't think it was possible for a liquid to be so utterly revolting. Are you sure about this...?
bacchus_blessing.name: Bacchus' Blessing

b52.description: Coffee, Irish Cream, and congac. You will get bombed.
b52.drink_desc: Kahlua, Irish Cream, and congac. You will get bombed.
b52.name: B-52

atomicbomb.description: Nuclear proliferation never tasted so good.
atomicbomb.drink_desc: Nanotrasen cannot take legal responsibility for your actions after imbibing.
atomicbomb.name: Atomic Bomb

applejack.description: A highly concentrated alcoholic beverage made by repeatedly freezing cider and removing the ice.
applejack.drink_desc: When cider isn't strong enough, you gotta jack it.
applejack.name: Applejack

alliescocktail.description: A drink made from your allies.
alliescocktail.drink_desc: A drink made from your allies.
alliescocktail.name: Allies Cocktail

ale.description: A dark alchoholic beverage made by malted barley and yeast.
ale.drink_desc: A freezing pint of delicious Ale
ale.name: Ale

ahdomaieclipse.description: Blizzard in a glass. Tajaran signature drink!
ahdomaieclipse.drink_desc: Blizzard in a glass. Tajaran signature drink!
ahdomaieclipse.name: Ahdomai's Eclipse

acidspit.description: A drink by Nanotrasen. Made from live aliens.
acidspit.drink_desc: A drink from Nanotrasen. Made from live aliens.
acidspit.name: Acid Spit

aciddreams.description: This one looks just weird and reeks of acid.
aciddreams.drink_desc: This one looks just weird and reeks of acid.
aciddreams.name: Acid Dreams

absinthe.description: Watch out that the Green Fairy doesn't come for you!
absinthe.drink_desc: The green fairy is going to get you now!
absinthe.name: Absinthe

ethanol.description: A well-known alcohol with a variety of applications.
ethanol.name: Ethanol

enzyme.description: A special catalyst that makes certain culinary chemical reactions happen instantly instead of taking hours or days.
enzyme.name: Universal Enzyme

entpoly.description: An ichor, derived from a certain mushroom, makes for a bad time.
entpoly.name: Entropic Polypnium

egg.description: A runny and viscous mixture of clear and yellow fluids.
egg.name: Egg

dry_ramen.description: Space age food, since August 25, 1958. Contains dried noodles, vegetables, and chemicals that boil in contact with water.
dry_ramen.name: Dry Ramen
dry_ramen.taste_description: dry ramen coated with what might just be your tears

vanillapudding.description: A great dessert for vanilla lovers.
vanillapudding.drink_desc: A rich vanilla dessert, in drinkable form.
vanillapudding.name: Vanilla Pudding

triple_citrus.description: A refreshing mixed drink of orange, lemon and lime juice.
triple_citrus.drink_desc: As colorful and healthy as it is delicious.
triple_citrus.name: Triple Citrus

tonic.description: It tastes strange but at least the quinine keeps the Space Malaria at bay.
tonic.drink_desc: Quinine tastes funny, but at least it'll keep that Space Malaria away.
tonic.name: Tonic Water

tomatojuice.description: Tomatoes made into juice. What a waste of big, juicy tomatoes, huh?
tomatojuice.drink_desc: Are you sure this is tomato juice?
tomatojuice.name: Tomato Juice

icetea.description: No relation to a certain rap artist/ actor.
icetea.drink_desc: No relation to a certain rap artist/ actor.
icetea.name: Iced Tea

tea.description: Tasty black tea: It has antioxidants. It's good for you!
tea.drink_desc: A glass of hot tea. Perhaps a cup with a handle would have been smarter?
tea.name: Tea

spacemountainwind.description: Blows right through you like a space wind.
spacemountainwind.drink_desc: Space Mountain Wind. As you know, there are no mountains in space, only wind.
spacemountainwind.name: Space Mountain Wind

space_up.description: Tastes like a hull breach in your mouth.
space_up.drink_desc: Space-up. It helps keep your cool.
space_up.name: Space-Up

cola.drink_desc: A glass of refreshing Space Cola.
cola.name: Cola

sodawater.description: A can of club soda. Why not make a scotch and soda?
sodawater.drink_desc: Soda water. Why not make a scotch and soda?
sodawater.name: Soda Water

rewriter.description: The secret of the sanctuary of the Librarian...
rewriter.drink_desc: The secret of the sanctuary of the Librarian...
rewriter.name: Rewriter

pumpkin_latte.description: A mix of pumpkin juice and coffee.
pumpkin_latte.drink_desc: A mix of coffee and pumpkin juice.
pumpkin_latte.name: Pumpkin Latte

potato.drink_desc: Who in the hell requests this? Gross!
potato.name: Potato Juice

poisonberryjuice.description: A tasty juice blended from various kinds of very deadly and toxic berries.
poisonberryjuice.name: Poison Berry Juice

pineapplejuice.description: Pineapples juiced into a liquid. Sweet and sugary.
pineapplejuice.drink_desc: A bright drink, sweet and sugary.
pineapplejuice.name: Pineapple Juice

paradise_punch.description: Tastes just how you'd think Paradise would if you could bottle it.
paradise_punch.name: Paradise Punch

orangejuice.description: Both delicious AND rich in Vitamin C, what more do you need?
orangejuice.name: Orange juice

nuka_cola.drink_desc: Don't cry, Don't raise your eye, It's only nuclear wasteland.
nuka_cola.name: Nuka Cola

soymilk.description: An opaque white liquid made from soybeans.
soymilk.name: Soy Milk

cream.description: The fatty, still liquid part of milk. Why don't you mix this with some scotch, eh?
cream.name: Cream

chocolate_milk.description: Chocolate-flavored milk, tastes like being a kid again.
chocolate_milk.drink_desc: Smells like childhood. What would they need to add to make it taste like childhood too?
chocolate_milk.name: Chocolate milk

milk.description: An opaque white liquid produced by the mammary glands of mammals.
milk.name: Milk

meteor_malt.description: Soft drinks have been detected on collision course with your tastebuds.
meteor_malt.name: Meteor Malt

limejuice.drink_desc: A glass of sweet-sour lime juice.
limejuice.name: Lime Juice

lemon_lime.description: A tangy substance made of 0.5% natural citrus!
lemon_lime.name: Lemon Lime

kiraspecial.description: Long live the guy who everyone had mistaken for a girl. Baka!
kiraspecial.drink_desc: Long live the guy who everyone had mistaken for a girl. Baka!
kiraspecial.name: Kira Special

ice.description: Frozen water, your dentist wouldn't like you chewing this.
ice.drink_desc: Generally, you're supposed to put something else in there too...
ice.name: Ice

hot_coco.description: Made with love! And cocoa beans.
hot_coco.name: Hot Chocolate

grapejuice.description: This juice is known to stain shirts.
grapejuice.drink_desc: If you leave it out for long enough, it might turn into wine.
grapejuice.name: Grape Juice

grape_granade.description: Exploding with grape flavor and a favorite among ERT members system-wide.
grape_granade.name: Grape Granade

gibbfloats.description: Ice cream on top of a Dr. Gibb glass.
gibbfloats.drink_desc: Dr. Gibb with ice cream on top.
gibbfloats.name: Gibb Floats

fyrsskartears.description: Plasmonic based drink that was consumed by ancient inhabitants of Skrellian homeworld.
fyrsskartears.drink_desc: Plasmonic based drink that was consumed by ancient inhabitants of Skrellian homeworld.
fyrsskartears.name: Tears of Fyrsskar

dr_gibb.description: A delicious blend of 42 different flavours
dr_gibb.drink_desc: Dr. Gibb. Not as dangerous as the name might imply.
dr_gibb.name: Dr. Gibb

doctorsdelight.description: A gulp a day keeps the MediBot away. That's probably for the best.
doctorsdelight.drink_desc: A healthy mixture of juices, guaranteed to keep you healthy until the next toolboxing takes place.
doctorsdelight.name: The Doctor's Delight

soy_latte.description: A nice and tasty beverage while you are reading your hippie books.
soy_latte.drink_desc: A nice and refrshing beverage while you are reading.
soy_latte.name: Soy Latte

icecoffee.description: Coffee and ice, refreshing and cool.
icecoffee.drink_desc: A drink to perk you up and refresh you!
icecoffee.name: Iced Coffee

cafe_mocha.description: The perfect blend of coffee, milk, and chocolate.
cafe_mocha.drink_desc: The perfect blend of coffee, milk, and chocolate.
cafe_mocha.name: Cafe Mocha

cafe_latte.description: A nice, strong and tasty beverage while you are reading.
cafe_latte.drink_desc: A nice, strong and refreshing beverage while you are reading.
cafe_latte.name: Cafe Latte

coffee.description: Coffee is a brewed drink prepared from roasted seeds, commonly called coffee beans, of the coffee plant.
coffee.drink_desc: Don't drop it, or you'll send scalding liquid and glass shards everywhere.
coffee.name: Coffee

icecoco.description: Hot cocoa and ice, refreshing and cool.
icecoco.drink_desc: A sweeter drink to perk you up and refresh you!
icecoco.name: Iced Cocoa

chocolatepudding.description: A great dessert for chocolate lovers.
chocolatepudding.drink_desc: A decadent chocolate dessert, in drinkable form.
chocolatepudding.name: Chocolate Pudding

carrotjuice.description: Just like a carrot, but without the crunching.
carrotjuice.drink_desc: Just like a carrot, but without the crunching.
carrotjuice.name: Carrot juice

brownstar.description: It's not what it sounds like...
brownstar.drink_desc: Its not what it sounds like...
brownstar.name: Brown Star

blumpkinjuice.drink_desc: Unhealthy and revolting! It seems to be glowing...
blumpkinjuice.name: Blumpkin Juice

blackeye_brew.description: Creamy, smooth flavor, just like the bald heads of the masses. Supposedly aged for 30 years.
blackeye_brew.name: Blackeye Brew

berryjuice.description: A delicious blend of several different kinds of berries.
berryjuice.drink_desc: Berry juice. Or maybe it's jam. Who cares?
berryjuice.name: Berry Juice

banana.description: The raw essence of a banana.
banana.drink_desc: The raw essence of a banana. HONK
banana.name: Banana Juice

arnold_palmer.description: A wholesome mixture of lemonade and iced tea.
arnold_palmer.drink_desc: A wholesome mixture of lemonade and iced tea... looks like somebody didn't stir this one very well.
arnold_palmer.name: Arnold Palmer

apple-pocalypse.description: If doomsday came in fruit form, it'd probably be apples.
apple-pocalypse.name: Apple-pocalypse

cornoil.description: An oil derived from various types of corn.
cornoil.name: Corn Oil

corn_syrup.description: A sweet syrup derived from corn starch that has had its starches converted into maltose and other sugars.
corn_syrup.name: Corn Syrup

corn_starch.description: The powdered starch of maize, derived from the kernel's endosperm. Used as a thickener for gravies and puddings.
corn_starch.name: Corn Starch

cocoa.description: A fatty, bitter paste made from cocoa beans.
cocoa.name: Cocoa Powder

chocolate.description: Chocolate is a delightful product derived from the seeds of the theobroma cacao tree.
chocolate.name: Chocolate

chicken_soup.description: An old household remedy for mild illnesses.
chicken_soup.name: Chicken soup

cherryjelly.description: Totally the best. Only to be spread on foods with excellent lateral symmetry.
cherryjelly.name: Cherry Jelly

cheese.description: Some cheese. Pour it out to make it solid.
cheese.name: Cheese

capsaicin.description: This is what makes chilis hot.
capsaicin.name: Capsaicin Oil

bluecherryjelly.description: Blue and tastier kind of cherry jelly.
bluecherryjelly.name: Blue Cherry Jelly

beans.description: A dish made of mashed beans cooked with lard.
beans.name: Refried beans

bbqsauce.description: Sweet, smoky, savory, and gets everywhere. Perfect for grilling.
bbqsauce.name: BBQ Sauce

applejuice.description: The sweet juice of an apple, fit for all ages.
applejuice.drink_desc: Apple juice. Maybe it would have been better in a pie...
applejuice.name: Apple Juice

coniine.description: A neurotoxin that rapidly causes respiratory failure.
coniine.name: Coniine

confetti.description: Pure, liquid confetti. Explodes into a colorful bomb when exposed to heat.
confetti.name: Confetti

colorful_reagent.description: It's pure liquid colors. That's a thing now.
colorful_reagent.name: Colorful Reagent

clf3.description: An extremely volatile substance, handle with the utmost care.
clf3.name: Chlorine Trifluoride

cholesterol.description: Pure cholesterol. Probably not very good for you.
cholesterol.name: Cholesterol

cbd.description: A non-psychoactive phytocannabinoid extracted from the cannabis plant.
cbd.name: Cannabidiol

carpotoxin.description: A deadly neurotoxin produced by the dreaded spess carp.
carpotoxin.name: Carpotoxin

carpet.description: A covering of thick fabric used on floors. This type looks particularly gross.
carpet.name: Carpet

capulettium_plus.description: A rare and expensive drug that will silence the user and let him appear dead as long as it's in the body. Rest to play dead, stand up to wake up.
capulettium_plus.name: Capulettium Plus

capulettium.description: A rare drug that causes the user to appear dead for some time.
capulettium.name: Capulettium

blood.drink_desc: Are you sure this is tomato juice?
blood.name: Blood

teslium_paste.description: Deals medium burn damage, and shocks those struck over time
teslium_paste.message_living: , and you feel a static shock
teslium_paste.name: Teslium paste

ripping_tendrils.description: Deals High Brute damage, as well as Stamina damage.
ripping_tendrils.message_living: , and you feel your skin ripping and tearing off
ripping_tendrils.name: Ripping Tendrils

lexorin_jelly.description: Deals Medium Brute damage, but massive amounts of Respiration Damage.
lexorin_jelly.message_living: , and your lungs feel heavy and weak
lexorin_jelly.name: Lexorin Jelly

kinetic.description: Deals Randomized damage, between 0.33 to 2.33 times the standard amount.
kinetic.name: Kinetic Gelatin

envenomed_filaments.description: Deals High Toxin damage, causes Hallucinations, and injects Spores into the bloodstream.
envenomed_filaments.message_living: , and you feel sick and nauseated
envenomed_filaments.name: Envenomed Filaments

cryogenic_liquid.description: Deals Medium Brute damage, Stamina Damage, and injects Frost Oil into its victims, freezing them to death.
cryogenic_liquid.message: The blob splashes you with an icy liquid
cryogenic_liquid.message_living: , and you feel cold and tired
cryogenic_liquid.name: Cryogenic Liquid

boiling_oil.description: Deals High Burn damage, and sets the victim aflame.
boiling_oil.message: The blob splashes you with burning oil
boiling_oil.message_living: , and you feel your skin char and melt
boiling_oil.name: Boiling Oil

b_sorium.description: Deals High Brute damage, and sends people flying away.
b_sorium.message: The blob slams into you, and sends you flying
b_sorium.name: Sorium

beer2.description: An alcoholic beverage made from malted grains, hops, yeast, and water.
beer2.name: Beer

bath_salts.description: Sometimes packaged as a refreshing bathwater additive, these crystals are definitely not for human consumption.
bath_salts.name: Bath Salts

bacon_grease.description: Hook me up to an IV of that sweet, sweet stuff!
bacon_grease.name: Pure bacon grease

amutationtoxin.description: An advanced corruptive toxin produced by slimes.
amutationtoxin.name: Advanced Mutation Toxin

ash.description: Ashes to ashes, dust to dust.
ash.name: Ash

aranesp.description: An illegal performance enhancing drug. Side effects might include chest pain, seizures, swelling, headache, fever... ... ...
aranesp.name: Aranesp

ants.description: A sample of a lost breed of Space Ants (formicidae bastardium tyrannus), they are well-known for ravaging the living shit out of pretty much anything.
ants.name: Ants

ammonia.description: A caustic substance commonly used in fertilizer or household cleaners.
ammonia.name: Ammonia

amanitin.description: A toxin produced by certain mushrooms. Very deadly.
amanitin.name: Amanitin

aluminum.description: A silvery white and ductile member of the boron group of chemical elements.
aluminum.name: Aluminum

facid.description: Fluorosulfuric acid is a an extremely corrosive super-acid.
facid.name: Fluorosulfuric Acid

sacid.description: A strong mineral acid with the molecular formula H2SO4.
sacid.name: Sulphuric acid

acetone.description: Pure 100% nail polish remover, also works as an industrial solvent.
acetone.name: Acetone

acetic_acid.description: A weak acid that is the main component of vinegar and bad hangovers.
acetic_acid.name: Acetic acid

acetaldehyde.description: Acetaldehyde is a common industrial chemical. It is a severe irritant.
acetaldehyde.name: Acetaldehyde
